website_summaries.verdict: A powerful stick vacuum designed specifically to clean hardwood floors without scratching them.
pros: The soft bristles of the head ensure that your floor stays scratch-free while you suck up crumbs, pet hair, and other debris with this efficient vacuum
The slim head easily reaches under furniture and appliances, and the vacuum can be used in upright or handheld mode
Provides reliable power for a cordless model
cons: The short batterty life means you can only clean a couple of rooms before the vacuum needs charging

customer_reviews.title: A game changer for sure!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a gamecharger, at least for me. Cleaning my small NYC apt is now something I get done in about 30 min!! Thats crazy to me!! My previous really good yet bulky and cumbersome older vacuum was making me take a whole afternoon to clean my apt!! Its mindblowing to me how quickly and easily i get the same job done just by switching to this Dyson V7!! If theres a fire in the house, im running out with my laptop and my Dyson! Well... and my guitar... and my... The V7 is coming with me for sure!!! Looove it!
customer_reviews.author: MarceloA

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We tried 3 different Tineco models. Customer service was exceptional, the product wasn't! Searching for a quick, effortless, cordless vacuum, we were reluctant to spend a bunch of $...maybe just haul out the electric model instead. We took a chance on the Fluffy and it turned out great. Works so well on bare floors and also works very good on area carpets. The price is good...the product quality is there...buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Taylor Leavens

customer_reviews.title: Dyson V7 the best for our new Luxury Vinyl Plank flooring!
customer_reviews.text: We just got new LVP flooring throughout our house. We were in a quandary as to what would be the best system for maintaining them. This was our third attempt. We are more than pleased with the Dyson V7 cordless it took less than 20 minutes to do our whole house. No loss of power. Hopefully mounting it today in the garage just outside the laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Gidel

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several Dyson vacuums and I’m not disappointed in this one. We have wood floors and for quick cleanings it’s great. Picks up everything. Lightweight and easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: sherri martin

customer_reviews.title: Superior stick vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best stick vacuum I have ever purchased! It absolutely lives up to all the hype about Dyson products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is worth the money you spend. It has so many attachments and is so easy to use. It also acts as a duster with one of the attachments. The only downside is the battery only lasts about 12 minutes so when you aren’t using it between cleaning always have it plugged in. It’s super light and easy to empty and doesn’t clog! So happy with the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Works well on polished cement floors
customer_reviews.text: It's really handy to have it nearby instead of having to drag a vacum out - I use it on a polished cement floor and it does a great job of picking up all sized of small things, dirt and dust - I'm quite happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. Works great! Fast shipping too! Money well spend!
customer_reviews.author: Ye X.

customer_reviews.title: Superb Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: As with all Dyson products, quality is unmatched. Only negative is you need to squeeze handle while vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about dyson products. I have the original dc animal , but this one is convenient for quick cleans
customer_reviews.author: andrea diprojetto

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but battery sucks too
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Works amazing. Battery is terrible, doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: This Dyson cordless vacuum is great
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are wonderful, shows step by step on putting together, charging and for how long. I read most of the reviews and they are right when it runs out of charge it just stops. So, I was prepared to know how it works. I can’t stand on my feet for long periods of time. When it stops I know it is time for me to take a rest. I do not need to bend down when using this vacuum and it doesn’t hurt your back.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for the rubber floor tiles we have in our laundromat. Picks up the debris AND the dust, saving me lots of time by not having to mop for dust pickup. Money well spent for this. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well on our LVT floors
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't throw cat litter on our hard flooring. It even does a pretty good job on the carpet around the litter box. It's a convenient size and easy to use. Emptying the container is a little more complex than with another brand of vacuum cleaner we have, but I'm sure this will get easier with practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Find Cleaning Head for Wood / Hard Floors
customer_reviews.text: This model works very well on our hardwood floors. We had used a previous model Dyson with the brushes and it worked fine - I had never seen this “fluffy” cleaning head in any stores, just stumbled upon it here on Amazon when I was looking to replace a 4.5 year old vacuum that finally died. I think it will be more gentle on the wood finish and seems to get very small dust and lint easily off the floors.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's great to be able to vacuum without a a cord. The battery lasts at least as long as I need to compete the job. It is easy to empty. Plus it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Abbate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I will start with the only con... Battery life on max suction is fairly short. I have 3 dogs and 1 cat. This vaccum is a game changer for people with hard floors that have pets and have always struggled with daily shed control. Within 5 minutes or less in one pass I can clean our whole home without any fuss or mess. The charging station is great to have in the garage or possibly a closet/laundry room if you had a power source to plug in the base. This product is what you expect from Dyson and is 5 stars all day!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: 4 uses. No more suction. It doesn’t work for carpets anyway but it can’t even pick up some crumpled chips on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: The Cub

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Never ever worked! If I could return I would!!!! Worst dyson product ever! I’ve owned others and have loved but I should have listened to friends that bought and consumer report! But I thought a dyson what could be wrong? EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.author: 57 chevy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: It is so quiet! And it picks up everything. It is lightweight and easy to use. This vacuum maneuvers around chair legs and cleans the edges of baseboards better than any vacuum we have used including the whole house vacuum. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy ness of using but surely not for big cleaning joss
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing vacuum for my tile floors. Easily picks up dust, dirt and everything else. Love this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I clean up after parrots. Picks up large pieces of shredded toys from hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Please do not spend your money on this. After two years the battery will be out, and no help from the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kazu

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit heavy and battery doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in shock how fast the battery dies out. Power wise is good, but the top part is actually quite heavy and uncomfortable my wrist hurt a lot even though I didn't use it for long because battery dies pretty quickly. Its an OK vacuum. No really what I would expect from Dyson. I may have to return
customer_reviews.author: Adventurer1234

customer_reviews.title: Great suction power
customer_reviews.text: Works great as expected. Charge holds as notated. It picks up the bigger pieces like the reviews state but not the chunky pieces of carrot! I suppose I should stop dropping carrot bits on my floor anyway. Also gets the small grimey particles you can't see.
customer_reviews.author: OctopusQueen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful! I know the Dyson name means a quality product but wow was I surprised at how well this worked on all surfaces. I wish the battery lasted a little longer but it truly is s great product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Barbera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vacuum for new tile floors installed throughout house. It is an excellent vacuum with plenty of power and quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: reliable

product_meta.title: Dyson V7 Fluffy Cordless Stick Vacuum for Hard Floors
product_meta.description:
Clean wood floors thoroughly with this Dyson V7 Fluffy cordless vacuum. The fluffy cleanerhead has extra-soft bristles that prevent scratches, and the Dyson V7 Fluffy gives you up to 30 minutes of runtime (varies based on attachment/power mode). Includes bonus mini motorized tool for extra cleaning power on hard-to-reach areas. Cord-free, hassle-free, powerful suction. 

Features:
-- Soft roller cleaner head
Invented for hard floors. Soft roller cleaner head removes large debris and fine dust simultaneously. 
-- Transforms to clean up high
Balanced for cleaning up top, down below and in between. 
-- Mini motorized tool for tough tasks
Stiff nylon bristles remove pet hair and ground-in dirt from furniture, car seats and tight spaces. 
-- Convenient docking station
Stores and charges the machine and holds additional attachments. So it's always ready to go. 
-- Transforms to a handheld
This Dyson cord-free vacuum quickly transforms to a handheld for quick clean ups, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places.
-- Low profile heads
For easy cleaning under furniture. 
-- Hygienic bin emptying
Just push the button to release the dirt. 
-- Up to 30 minutes of powerful fade-free suction
Trigger releases instantly. Battery power is only used for cleaning. Up to 30 minutes of run time. 
-- Two Tier Radial cyclones
Fifteen cyclones, arranged across two tiers, work in parallel to increase airflow and capture more fine dust. 
-- Mini soft dusting brush
Mini soft dusting brush for gentle dusting around the home. 

What's Included: 
Dyson V7 Fluffy, Mini motorized tool, docking station, mini soft dusting brush, soft roller cleaner head

Powerful suction for whole-home cleaning. Up to 30 minutes of fade-free power.

Max Power Mode - Provides 6 minutes of higher suction for more difficult tasks
